attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The petitions.pm.gov.uk site was launched in 2006 to allow the public to put their views to the PM.

Where a response is reveived they're no different from the usual political fob off. 

People are suggestion their friends and family sign certain petitions yet nothing changes.

Given that these are a waste of time the government should abolish this site forthwith.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
